title: Tiered Service Delivery Model Professional Development for Educational Environment Rehabilitation Specialists

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level subject-matter expertise and problem-solving abilities
context.additional_context: Online project-based learning conducted in a bring-your-own-device (BYOD) environment, with continuous formative feedback

learning_goals: Learners can explain the components and implementation procedures of a tiered service delivery model in educational settings
Learners can apply a three-tiered (primary-secondary-tertiary) service model aligned with rehabilitation specialists' roles to practical cases
Through PBL, learners can complete service model design and improvement projects through collaborative teamwork
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
